mapper.select: SELECT memberId, mName, email, contact, regDate, remainTime FROM MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBERID ASC
SELECT memberId, mName, email, contact, regDate, remainTime FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBERID = #{id} ORDER BY MEMBERID ASC
SELECT memberId, mName, email, contact, regDate, remainTime FROM MEMBER WHERE mName like #{mName} ORDER BY MEMBERID ASC
SELECT memberId, mName, email, contact, regDate, remainTime FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL like #{email} ORDER BY MEMBERID ASC
SELECT memberId, mName, email, contact, regDate, remainTime FROM MEMBER WHERE CONTACT like #{contact} ORDER BY MEMBERID ASC
